CustomField.formula: IF(Check_In_Date__c > Next_Month_End_Date_Formula__c , NULL, IF( Check_Out_Date__c < Next_Month_Start_Date_Formula__c , NULL, IF(Check_Out_Date__c > Next_Month_End_Date_Formula__c , Next_Month_End_Date_Formula__c + 1, Check_Out_Date__c)))
CustomField.label: Next Month Check Out Date Formula
